### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [NSFW] [https://www.vipbox.lc/nhl/nhl-stanley-cup-final-edmonton-oilers-vs-florida-panthers-7-live](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vipbox.lc%2Fnhl%2Fnhl-stanley-cup-final-edmonton-oilers-vs-florida-panthers-7-live) ### Comment > The video never shows up with Stealth Mode enabled with the current options. If i disable Stealh Mode, the video comes up. > > I've tried disabling one option at a time (disable, test, enable. move on to next option and repeat.) but couldn't find a singular option to get it to work. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/601phdv101kwk4gkswsckkwkw0o0skci6mllo3tjrs.png?nc=1) [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gwfpakfdvio8kswc8gw80w8wk08wsgc19hatyc6o7z.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.18.0 nightly 5 (4768) System version: | Windows 10 22H2 Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode options: | Block WebRTC,
